reviewtext: Just briefly:1) It is very comfortable and adjustable line over the head has little grip shape left and right which makes it easy to arrange the proper shape over the ears.2) Sound is decent clear with a good BASS3) The price is just affordable4) Just get it...P.S3.5 mm jack is angle shape, or to say ankle shape, like otherwise the straight 3.5 jack (most of iPod original headphones are straight 3.5 mm jacks)
